use std::io; //æä¾›æ ‡å‡†è¾“å…¥çš„åº“
use std::cmp::Ordering; //æä¾›cmpæ–¹æ³•å’ŒOrderingç±»å‹
use rand::Rng; //Rngæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªtraitï¼Œæš‚æ—¶ä¸æ‡‚ï¼Œå®ƒæä¾›éšæœºæ•°ç”Ÿæˆå™¨åº”å®ç°çš„æ–¹æ³•
fn main() {
	println!("çŒœçŒœçœ‹ï¼");
	let secret_num = rand::thread_rng().gen_range(1, 101);
	println!("The secret num is {}", secret_num);
	
	loop {
		println!("è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„çŒœæµ‹");
		
		let mut guess = String::new();
		io::stdin().read_line(&mut guess).expect("Failed to read line");
		let guess: u32 = match guess.trim().parse() {
			Ok(num) => num,
			Err(_) => continue,
		};
		println!("You guessed: {}", guess);
		
		match guess.cmp(&secret_num) {
			Ordering::Less => println!("çŒœå°äº†"),
			Ordering::Greater => println!("çŒœå¤§äº†"),
			Ordering::Equal => {
				println!("çŒœå¯¹äº†ï¼");
				break;
			}
		}
	}
}

4-sumã€‚ä¸º4-sumè®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªç®—æ³•ã€‚

public int fourSum(int[] a) {
    int len = a.length;
    int cnt = 0;
    for (int l = 0; l < len - 3; l++) {
        for (int i = l + 1; i < len - 2; i++) {
            for (int j = i + 1, k = len - 1; j < k;) {
                if (a[l] + a[i] + a[j] + a[k] < 0) {
                    j++;
                } else if (a[l] + a[i] + a[j] + a[k] > 0) {
                    k--;
                } else {
                    cnt++;
                    j++;
                    k--;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return cnt;
}

å¿«é€Ÿ3-sumã€‚ä½œä¸ºçƒ­èº«ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿æ€§çº§åˆ«çš„ç®—æ³•å®ç°TwoSumFasteræ¥è®¡ç®—å·²æ’åºçš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­å’Œä¸º0çš„æ•´æ•°å¯¹çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„æ€æƒ³ä¸º3-sumé—®é¢˜ç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå¹³æ–¹çº§åˆ«çš„ç®—æ³•ã€‚
åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•å‰åå¤¹å‡»

public class TwoSumFaster {
    public int twoSumFaster(int[] a) {
        int cnt = 0;
        int len = a.length;
        for (int j = 0, k = len - 1; j < k;) {
            if (a[j] + a[k] < 0) {
                j++;
            } else if (a[j] + a[k] > 0) {
                k--;
            } else {
                j++;
                k--;
                ++cnt;
            }
        }
        return cnt;
    }
}

ç±»ä¼¼çš„ï¼š

public class ThreeSumFaster {   
    public int threeSumFaster(long[] a) {
        int cnt = 0;
        int len = a.length;
        for (int j = 0; j < len - 2 ; j ++) {
            for(int k = j + 1,h = len -1;k < h;){
                if (a[j] + a[k] + a[h] < 0) {
                    k++;
                } else if (a[j] + a[k] + a[h] > 0) {
                    h--;
                } else {
                    k++;
                    h--;
                    ++cnt;
                }
            }
        }
        return cnt;
    }
}

public static void ClosestPair(double[] arr) {
	Arrays.sort(arr);
    double min = Double.MAX_VALUE;
    int index1 = 0;
    int index2 = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < arr.length - 1; i++) {
        if(arr[i + 1] - arr[i] < min) {
            min = arr[i + 1] - arr[i];
            index1 = i;
            index2 = i + 1;
        }
    }
    System.out.println(arr[index1] + " " + arr[index2]);
}

public static void FarthestPair(double[] arr) {
    int max = 0, min = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
        if(arr[i] > arr[max])
            max = i;
        else if(arr[i] < arr[min])
            min = i;
    }
    System.out.println(arr[max] + " " + arr[min]);
}

public static int localMin(int[] arr) {
        if(arr == null || arr.length == 0)
            return -1;
        if(arr.length == 1 || arr[0] < arr[1])
            return 0;
        if(arr[arr.length - 1] < arr[arr.length - 2])
            return arr.length - 1;
        int left = 1;
        int right = arr.length - 2;
        while(left < right) {
            int mid = (left + right) / 2;
            if(arr[mid - 1] > arr[mid] && arr[mid + 1] > arr[mid])
                return mid;
            else if(arr[mid - 1] < arr[mid])
                right = mid - 1;
            else
                left = mid + 1;
        }
        return left;
    }

ä¸­æ–‡ç‰ˆç¿»è¯‘æœ‰è¯¯ï¼Œæ­¤é¢˜è¦æ±‚çš„è¿è¡Œæ—¶é—´å’Œnlogâ¡nn\log nnlognæˆæ­£æ¯”ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æ— æ³•ç±»æ¯”ä¸Šä¸€é¢˜ã€‚

å®˜ç½‘åŸæ–‡ï¼š
Local minimum in a matrix. Given an n-by-n array a[] of n2n^2n2 distinct integers, design an algorithm that runs in time proportional to n log n to find a local minimum: an pair of indices i and j such that a[i][j] < a[i+1][j], a[i][j] < a[i][j+1], a[i][j] < a[i-1][j], and a[i][j] < a[i][j-1] (assuming the neighboring entry is in bounds).
Extra credit: Design an algorithm that takes times proportional to n.

æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬n/2è¡Œä¸­çš„æœ€å°é¡¹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚a[n/2][j]ã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯å±€éƒ¨æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œæ£€æŸ¥å®ƒä¸Šä¸‹ä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ a[n/2-1][j]å’Œa[n/2+1][j]ï¼Œåœ¨è¾ƒå°çš„ç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ çš„åŠè¾¹ä¸­é‡å¤ã€‚

static class Pos {
    int row;
    int col;
    Pos(int a, int b) {
        row = a;
        col = b;
    }
}
private static int MinPos(int[] a) {
	if(a == null || a.length == 0)
	        return -1;
    int min = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
        if(a[i] < a[min])
            min = i;
    }
    return min;
}
public static Pos BinarySearch(int[][] arr) {
    if(arr.length == 1)
        return new Pos(0, 0);
    else {
        int min = MinPos(arr[0]);
        if(arr[0][min] < arr[1][min])
            return new Pos(0, min);
        min = MinPos(arr[arr.length - 1]);
        if(arr[arr.length - 1][min] < arr[arr.length - 2][min])
            return new Pos(arr.length - 1, min);
    }
    int up = 1;
    int down = arr.length - 2;
    int mid = 0;
    int min = 0;
    while(up <= down) {
        mid = (up + down) / 2;
        min = MinPos(arr[mid]);
        if(arr[mid][min] < arr[mid - 1][min] && arr[mid][min] < arr[mid + 1][min])
            return new Pos(mid, min);
        else if(arr[mid][min] > arr[mid - 1][min])
            down = mid - 1;
        else
            up = mid + 1;
    }
    return new Pos(mid, min);
}

æ€è·¯ï¼šä¸äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆæŠŠæ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ‰©å……åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•°çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¤šå‡ºæ¥çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ç”¨åŸæ•°ç»„çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¡«å……ã€‚å‡è®¾æ‰©å……åæ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦ä¸ºF[k]ï¼Œåˆ™è¯¥æ•°ç»„å¯ä»¥è¢«åˆ’åˆ†æˆé•¿åº¦ä¸ºF[k-2]å’ŒF[k-1]çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œåˆ’åˆ†ç‚¹æˆ‘ä»¬è®¾ä¸ºleft + F[k-2]ï¼ŒåƒäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾é‚£æ ·ï¼Œå…ˆæ£€æŸ¥è¿™ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æŸ¥æ‰¾ç›®æ ‡ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æ ¹æ®ä¸ç›®æ ‡çš„å¤§å°æ¯”è¾ƒç¼©å°åŒºé—´ç»§ç»­æœç´¢ã€‚

private static int[] F;
public static int Init(int n) {
    F = new int[20];
    F[0] = 0;
    F[1] = 1;
    int i = 2;
    while (i < 20) {
        F[i] = F[i - 1] + F[i - 2];
        if(F[i] > n)  //æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€æ¥è¿‘åŸæ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦çš„æ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•°
            break;
        i++;
    }
    return i;
}
public static int FibonacciSearch(int key, int[] arr) {
    int k = Init(arr.length);
    int[] tmp = Arrays.copyOf(arr, F[k]);   //æ‰©å……åŸæ•°ç»„
    for(int i = arr.length; i < tmp.length; i++)
        tmp[i] = arr[arr.length - 1];   //ç”¨æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¡«å……åé¢çš„ä½ç½®
    int low = 0;
    int high = tmp.length - 1;
    while(low <= high) {
        int mid = low + F[k-2];
        if(key < tmp[mid]) {
            high = mid;
            k -= 2;
        }
        else if(key > tmp[mid]) {
            low = mid + 1;
            k -= 1;
        }
        else {
            if(mid < arr.length)
                return mid;
            else
                return arr.length - 1;
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

public static int throwEgg(int n) {
    int F = (int)(Math.random() * n + 1);
    int up = 1;
    while(up < F)
        up <<= 1;
    int down = up >> 1;
    while (down < up) {
        int mid = (down + up) / 2;
        if(mid >= F)
            up = mid;
        else
            down = mid + 1;
    }
    return up;
}

public static int throwTwoEggs(int n) {
    int F = (int)(Math.random() * n + 1);
    int m = (int)Math.sqrt(n);
    int up = 1;
    while (up * m < F)
        up++;
    int down = up - 1;
    int high = down * m + 1;
    while (high < F)
        high++;
    return high;
}

public static int throwTwoEggs(int n) {
    int F = (int)(Math.random() * n + 1);
    int up = 1;
    while (up * up < F)
        up++;
    int down = up - 1;
    int high = down * down + 1;
    while (high < F)
        high++;
    return high;
}

~2lgNï¼šæ¯æ¬¡çŒœåŒºé—´ç«¯ç‚¹æ¥ç¼©å°åŒºé—´

public static int HotOrCold(int n) {
    int[] a = new int[n + 1];
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        a[i] = i;
    int num = (int)(Math.random() * n + 1);
    int guess1 = 1;
    int guess2 = n;
    while (true) {
        if(guess1 == num)
            return guess1;
        else if(guess2 == num)
            return guess2;
        else if(Math.abs(num - guess2) < Math.abs(num - guess1))
            guess1 = (guess1 + guess2) / 2;
        else
            guess2 = (guess1 + guess2) / 2;
    }
}
